initial_question.title: not executing with native install but working in .venv - on Windows
initial_question.body:
After installing git-remote-s3 with pip I had this issue when trying to clone :

```
git clone s3://xxx/git-remote_xxx-iiot-cdk/
```
```
Cloning into 'git-remote_xxx-iiot-cdk'...
git: 'remote-s3' is not a git command. See 'git --help'.

The most similar command is
        remote-fd
fatal: remote helper 's3' aborted session
``` 

But it worked in a random python environment. 

Also if I add the ./venv/Scripts that contains the git-remote-s3.exe to my Path, I can clone from anywhere, but it will probably stop working if I ever delete the python environment I took the git-remote-s3.exe from.

satisfaction_conditions: S3 repository cloning must execute successfully
